name: Oologist

name: Anatomist

name: Photographer
description: Colors include ash, black, blue, bronze, brown, cerulean, chestnut, ferruginous, gold, gray, green, indigo, lazuli, purple, red, rose, roseate, ruby, ruddy, rufous, snowy, white, yellow (34% of cards) 4 to 5 birds: 3 6+ birds: 6 Birds with colors in their names Wingspan_BonusCards_r5.indd   22 1/15/19   9:30 PM

name: Rodentologist
description: 2 per bird Birds that eat (15% of cards) Any bird with a symbol. The bird may also eat other kinds of food. Wingspan_BonusCards_r5.indd   4 1/15/19   9:30 PM

name: Ecologist
